name: Spy Hunter
overview: A homebrew remake of Spy Hunter by fibble42 released in 2022. It is an Arcade top down Action vehicle game that drew its inspiration from James Bond, this version written using Earok's Scorpion Engine!. As a super agent you must drive for your life in a turbo-charged car that is equipped with the most current weapon technology. The street is full of hostile agents, that have nothing else in mind than to atomize you and your engineering marvel. Manoeuvre your car at highest speed and with all your abilities, but watch out for the "Road Lord", the "Switch Blade", the "Enforcer" and the other hostile agents that will try to hold you back on land and water. You have to destroy them before they eliminate you.
